DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal propose study compare effect 4 week moderate high intensity aerobic exercise neuroplasticity , cognitive performance gait postural control sedentary healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise , Cognitive Function Neuroplasticity Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study compare effect moderate intensity aerobic exercise intervention ( deliver 55-64 % age-predicted maximal heart rate ) high intensity aerobic exercise intervention ( deliver 65 % -90 % age-predicted maximal heart rate ) measure probe cortical synaptic plasticity use transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) sedentary healthy adult .
DOC.criteria: Adult male female age 1860 year old Primary language English Sedentary ( define engage purposeful physical activity 2 time last two month ) Exercise clearance Presence cognitive , neurologic orthopedic condition could affect performance test training procedure History migraine . History faint spell unknown undetermined etiology might constitute seizure History seizure , diagnosis epilepsy , history abnormal ( epileptiform ) EEG family history treatment resistant epilepsy Any current history psychiatric illness Any unstable medical condition No medication absolute exclusion TMS . Medications review Principal Investigator decision inclusion make base following : The subject 's past medical history , drug dose , history recent medication change duration treatment , combination CNS active drug . The published TMS guideline review medication consider TMS ( Rossi , Hallett , Rossini , PascualLeone , & Safety TMS Consensus Group , 2009 ) . Any metal brain , skull elsewhere unless approve responsible MD Any medical device ( i.e . Cardiac pacemaker , deep brain stimulator , medication infusion pump , cochlear implant , vagal nerve stimulator ) Intracranial lesion Substance abuse dependence within past six month Subjects , Investigator 's opinion , might suitable study
